data.title: Science Fiction and Fantasy Books In Order
data.meta_description: TFR’s index of science fiction and fantasy books in order. From this list of science fiction & fantasy authors, you can discover...
data.text:
The Fantasy Review’s index of science fiction and fantasy books in order. From this list of science fiction and fantasy authors, you can discover the publication or chronological order of any series, as well as links to beginner’s guides, reviews, and author interviews.

New authors and books are constantly being added to this list, but if you want to request an author to be added, please let us know through the contact form on the Contact page.

This index of science fiction and fantasy authors is in alphabetical order, by surname. For lists relating to series of books in a franchise (e.g. Warhammer 40,000), please see our list of Science Fiction and Fantasy Franchise Books In Order (coming soon).

Index of Science Fiction and Fantasy Authors
